title: Scale is okay
text: The scale is okay. Though compared to the three other scales I use regularly it's calibration appears to be off and the app doesn't sync with the health app so I can sync data with my calorie tracker. I think I'm just going to have to shell out some extra cash to get a new scale that does.

title: Scale works fine but still no Health App integration
text: Title says it all. Have been waiting since the health app came out for support but they still have not done so. Time to start looking for a new scale that does.

title: Update
text: App for the scale needs to be updated to work with the latest IOS operating system. App will not sync with the scale

title: Fix this app for the ios8!!!!
text: Some parts of this application work with the scale and other parts don't for instance when you press certain buttons on the app a white line comes up at the bottom and the app freezes and you must close it and restarted to even do anything please fix this problem immediately and I will give you a good review

title: Could be better
text: Scale works great, easily syncs to my iPhone. Could be better if it syncs with Apple Health

title: Used to be nice
text: Now need to be updated but not being done !!!

title: Needs fixes
text: Basic weight works fine. Editing settings app often hangs, white box shows as other reviews mention. Changing weight to Kg does not work, please fix.

title: iOS 9
text: I liked the app. Simple, understandable. The release requires update ASAP, doesn't work with iOS 9. Also hope that it would be able to connect to the Health app.

title: Needs an update
text: Ever since this update came out, my scale won't sync with the app. It keeps saying the scale cannot be found. Otherwise, I love the scale and app

title: Meh
text: It's a scale with readout on your phone. Doesn't support Apple Health. Sometimes it confuses users and sends people in a tail spin panic that they gained weight. Also it's not consistent. We had it on tile and got various readings.

title: It Fails to open with new update 9
text: It Fails to open with new update 9

title: App works as promised with scale but not with Apple Health
text: This app works as promised with the scale but it is not an available source for Apple health. I hope the developers fix this soon.

title: Works good, could be Great
text: I hope they update this app to work with HealthKit or at least give it the ability to calculate BMI

title: Good scale
text: The hardware gets 5 stars. The software stinks. No HealthKit integration. Cannot add and subtract. Graphs are upside down. Stopped working with iOS 9. I'm done with this product.

title: Crashes in iOS9
text: Love the app till iOS9. Please update the app, and hopefully make it compatible with Apple health kit. Thanks!

title: App crashes
text: App crashes with iOS9-not happy!

title: Crashes on iOS9
text: This app no longer works after updating to iOS 9

title: HealthKit Please
text: Scale and app would earn a 5 Star rating with HealthKit integration.

title: Not all functions work.
text:
Can't carnage start weight. 
Can't set target goal. 
Can't change icon. 
Can't change color. 

Freezes up. Must reset. 

More stars when bugs fixed.

title: Nice scale... Terrible app
text: I got this scale cheap on Amazon. The scale itself seems nice but the app is not. It will read my weight, but that's about all. I can't delete entries or edit anything. Can't even edit profile. App locks up when trying to do anything. I'm using app on an iPhone 4s running iOS 8.0.2

title: Not iOS7 Compatible
text: This, and the matched digital scale, was great...until I updated to iOS7. Now it crashes on startup. Already sent word to their support address, no confirmation of receipt or anything.
